sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		DAMAGE_CARGOID as string,
		DLR_ID as string,
		F_DAMAGE as string,
		DEALER_ETA as string,
		DAMAGESOURCE as string,
		VPC as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_GROUP_CODE as string,
		DamageType as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_CODE as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_DESCRIPTION as string,
		DAMAGE_STARTDATE as string,
		Severity as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		Brand as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_Key as string,
		HD_LOCATION as string,
		ORDER_TYPE as string,
		Customer as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE as string,
		Inv_LinkDate as string,
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		DAMAGE_CARGOID as string,
		DLR_ID as string,
		F_DAMAGE as string,
		DEALER_ETA as string,
		DAMAGESOURCE as string,
		VPC as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_GROUP_CODE as string,
		DamageType as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_CODE as string,
		DAMAGE_HD_DESCRIPTION as string,
		DAMAGE_STARTDATE as string,
		Severity as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		Brand as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_Key as string,
		HD_LOCATION as string,
		ORDER_TYPE as string,
		Customer as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE as string,
		Inv_LinkDate as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Inv_LinkFlag,
		Dashboard,
		DAMAGE_CARGOID,
		DLR_ID,
		F_DAMAGE,
		DEALER_ETA,
		DAMAGESOURCE,
		VPC,
		VPC_ID,
		LOCATION_ID,
		DAMAGE_HD_GROUP_CODE,
		DamageType,
		DAMAGE_HD_CODE,
		DAMAGE_HD_DESCRIPTION,
		DAMAGE_STARTDATE,
		Severity,
		ModelLine,
		Org_ID,
		Brand,
		RailHead,
		Truck_Key,
		HD_LOCATION,
		ORDER_TYPE,
		Customer,
		CUST_ID,
		F_HOLD_DAMAGE,
		Inv_LinkDate
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
